name: Just Keep Swimming (kkwalla, AstralEnergy, Magolich, achen9, coelakan)
name_original: Just Keep Swimming (kkwalla, AstralEnergy, Magolich, achen9, coelakan)
description:
An endless 2D runner about a friendly shark who just can’t stop moving!

Click and drag items to clear paths and power up O’Neal the shark to help him ride the waves of the deep sea.

               

Made for Innovator's Jam 2021.

Programming by Angela Chen, Joshua Barbosa and Adrienne Chu 

Art by Taylor Liu 

Music by Jared Barbosa 

SFX from freesound.org
